Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect the crop from water scarcity during summer.
The high temperature increases the water requirement of the maize crop. Proper irrigation is necessary to avoid water-related issues.
High temperatures may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply Streptocyclin in the root zone.
Install pheromone traps to manage brinjal shoot and fruit borer. Use neem-based pesticides at the primary stage of pest infestation.
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8 m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during the day time.
